name: droidtechknow-dashboard
description: This app is used to fill the entries into mysql databases.

scripts.deleteBundle: git checkout build && git rebase master && rm -rf public/ && git add public/ && git commit -m 'delete bundle file' && git push origin build -f
scripts.git: git add public/ && git commit -m 'update bundle file' && git push origin build && git checkout master
scripts.publish: npm run deleteBundle && npm run build --prefix frontend/ && npm run git && npm run logs

author: Gulfam Ansari
